bio:
Damiano Raveenthiran is the Founder and CEO of Startup Slang, a Toronto-based eCommerce agency, helping businesses grow by offering great creative services that aim to revolutionize the way brands are created and scaled. Damiano has more than 10 years of expertise in the industry and has been a Fiverr Pro seller for 3+years, with more than 1000 clients from all over the world.
|
shortsummary:Shopify expert, entrepreneur and eCommerce whizz with 10+ years of industry experience & high-profile clients such as Panasonic and Dyson. He has been a Fiverr Pro seller for 3+ years with 1k+ clients globally.
title: Shopify expert, entrepreneur and eCommerce whizz with 10+ years of industry experience; Fiverr Pro seller for 3+ years with 1k+ clients globally.
